remarks: Infer isomorphism from one direction of an order proof for isomorphisms between strict orders.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
statement:
soisoi $p |- ( ( ( R Or A /\ S Po B ) /\ ( H : A -onto-> B /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x R y -> ( H ` x ) S ( H ` y ) ) ) ) -> H Isom R , S ( A , B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
